verses.verse: Now the <S%H7458>famine<s%> was <S%H3515>severe<s%> in the <S%H776>land.<s%>

So it <S%H1961>came<s%> about <S%H9201>when<s%> they had <S%H3615>finished<s%> <S%H398>eating<s%> the <S%H7668>grain<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> they had <S%H935>brought<s%> from <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%> that their father <S%H1>said<s%> to them, <S%H559>"Go<s%> <S%H7725>back,<s%> <S%H7725>buy<s%> us a <S%H7666>little<s%> <S%H4592>food.<s%>"

<S%H3063>Judah<s%> <S%H559>spoke<s%> to him, however, <S%H559>saying,<s%> "The <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H5749>solemnly<s%> <S%H5749>warned<s%> us, 'You shall not <S%H7200>see<s%> my <S%H6440>face<s%> <S%H1115>unless<s%> your <S%H251>brother<s%> is with you.'
<S%H518>"If<s%> you <S%H7971>send<s%> our <S%H251>brother<s%> with us, we will <S%H3381>go<s%> <S%H3381>down<s%> and <S%H7666>buy<s%> you <S%H400>food.<s%>

"But <S%H518>if<s%> you do not <S%H7971>send<s%> [him,] we will not <S%H3381>go<s%> <S%H3381>down;<s%> for the <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to us, 'You shall not <S%H7200>see<s%> my <S%H6440>face<s%> <S%H1115>unless<s%> your <S%H251>brother<s%> is with you.'"

Then <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H4100>"Why<s%> did you <S%H7489>treat<s%> me so <S%H7489>badly<s%> by <S%H5046>telling<s%> the <S%H376>man<s%> whether you <S%H5750>still<s%> had [another] <S%H251>brother<s%>?"

But they <S%H559>said,<s%> "The <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H7592>questioned<s%> <S%H7592>particularly<s%> about us and our <S%H4138>relatives,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> 'Is your father <S%H1>still<s%> <S%H5750>alive<s%>? <S%H2416>Have<s%> you [another] <S%H3426>brother<s%>?' So we <S%H251>answered<s%> his <S%H5046>questions.<s%> Could we <S%H1697>possibly<s%> <S%H3045>know<s%> that he would <S%H3045>say,<s%> <S%H559>'Bring<s%> your <S%H3381>brother<s%> <S%H251>down<s%>'?"

And <S%H3063>Judah<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to his father <S%H1>Israel,<s%> <S%H3478>"Send<s%> the <S%H7971>lad<s%> with me, and we will <S%H5288>arise<s%> and <S%H6965>go,<s%> that we may <S%H1980>live<s%> and not <S%H2421>die,<s%> we as <S%H4191>well<s%> as you and our <S%H1571>little<s%> <S%H2945>ones.<s%>

"I <S%H595>myself<s%> will be <S%H6148>surety<s%> for him; you may <S%H1245>hold<s%> <S%H3027><s%> me <S%H4480>responsible<s%> <S%H3027><s%> for him. <S%H518>If<s%> I do not <S%H935>bring<s%> him [back] to you and <S%H3322>set<s%> him <S%H6440>before<s%> you, then let me <S%H2398>bear<s%> the <S%H2398>blame<s%> before you <S%H3605>forever.<s%> <S%H3117><s%>
"For <S%H3884>if<s%> we had not <S%H4102>delayed,<s%> <S%H3588>surely<s%> by <S%H6258>now<s%> we could have <S%H7725>returned<s%> <S%H6471>twice.<s%>"

Then their father <S%H1>Israel<s%> <S%H3478>said<s%> to them, <S%H559>"If<s%> [it must be] <S%H518>so,<s%> <S%H3651>then<s%> <S%H645>do<s%> <S%H6213>this:<s%> <S%H2088>take<s%> <S%H3947>some<s%> of the <S%H4480>best<s%> <S%H2173>products<s%> of the <S%H2173>land<s%> in your <S%H776>bags,<s%> and <S%H3627>carry<s%> <S%H3381>down<s%> to the <S%H3381>man<s%> as a <S%H376>present,<s%> a <S%H4503>little<s%> <S%H4592>balm<s%> and a <S%H6875>little<s%> <S%H4592>honey,<s%> <S%H1706>aromatic<s%> <S%H5219>gum<s%> and <S%H5219>myrrh,<s%> <S%H3910>pistachio<s%> <S%H992>nuts<s%> and <S%H992>almonds.<s%>

"And <S%H3947>take<s%> <S%H4932>double<s%> [the] <S%H3701>money<s%> in your <S%H3027>hand,<s%> and <S%H7725>take<s%> <S%H7725>back<s%> in your <S%H3027>hand<s%> the <S%H3701>money<s%> that was <S%H7725>returned<s%> in the <S%H6310>mouth<s%> of your <S%H572>sacks;<s%> <S%H194>perhaps<s%> it was a <S%H4870>mistake.<s%>
<S%H3947>"Take<s%> your <S%H251>brother<s%> also, and <S%H6965>arise,<s%> <S%H7725>return<s%> to the <S%H376>man;<s%>

and may <S%H410>God<s%> <S%H7706>Almighty<s%> <S%H5414>grant<s%> you <S%H7356>compassion<s%> in the <S%H6440>sight<s%> of the <S%H376>man,<s%> that he may <S%H7971>release<s%> to you your <S%H312>other<s%> <S%H251>brother<s%> and <S%H1144>Benjamin.<s%> And as for me, <S%H834>if<s%> I am <S%H7921>bereaved<s%> of my <S%H7921>children,<s%> I am <S%H7921>bereaved.<s%> "

So the <S%H376>men<s%> <S%H3947>took<s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H4503>present,<s%> and they <S%H3947>took<s%> <S%H4932>double<s%> [the] <S%H3701>money<s%> in their <S%H3027>hand,<s%> and <S%H1144>Benjamin;<s%> then they <S%H6965>arose<s%> and <S%H3381>went<s%> <S%H3381>down<s%> to <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> and <S%H5975>stood<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H3130>Joseph.<s%>

When <S%H3130>Joseph<s%> <S%H7200>saw<s%> <S%H1144>Benjamin<s%> with them, he <S%H559>said<s%> to his <S%H1004>house<s%> <S%H834>steward,<s%> <S%H5921><s%> <S%H935>"Bring<s%> the <S%H376>men<s%> into the <S%H1004>house,<s%> and <S%H2873>slay<s%> [an animal] and <S%H3559>make<s%> <S%H3559>ready;<s%> for the <S%H376>men<s%> are to <S%H398>dine<s%> with me at <S%H6672>noon.<s%>"
So the <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H6213>did<s%> as <S%H3130>Joseph<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> and <S%H935>brought<s%> the <S%H376>men<s%> to Joseph's <S%H1004>house.<s%>

Now the <S%H376>men<s%> were <S%H3372>afraid,<s%> <S%H3588>because<s%> they were <S%H935>brought<s%> to Joseph's <S%H1004>house;<s%> and they <S%H559>said,<s%> "[It is] <S%H5921>because<s%> <S%H1697><s%> of the <S%H3701>money<s%> that was <S%H7725>returned<s%> in our <S%H572>sacks<s%> the <S%H8462>first<s%> <S%H8462>time<s%> that we are being <S%H935>brought<s%> in, that he may <S%H1556>seek<s%> <S%H1556>occasion<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> us and <S%H5307>fall<s%> upon us, and <S%H3947>take<s%> us for <S%H5650>slaves<s%> with our <S%H2543>donkeys.<s%>"

So they <S%H5066>came<s%> <S%H5066>near<s%> to Joseph's <S%H1004>house<s%> <S%H376>steward<s%><S%H834>,<s%> <S%H5921><s%> and <S%H1696>spoke<s%> to him at the <S%H6607>entrance<s%> of the <S%H1004>house,<s%>
and <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H994>"Oh,<s%> my <S%H113>lord,<s%> we <S%H3381>indeed<s%> <S%H3381>came<s%> <S%H3381>down<s%> the <S%H8462>first<s%> <S%H8462>time<s%> to <S%H7666>buy<s%> <S%H400>food,<s%>

and it <S%H1961>came<s%> about <S%H3588>when<s%> we <S%H935>came<s%> to the <S%H4411>lodging<s%> <S%H4411>place,<s%> that we <S%H6605>opened<s%> our <S%H572>sacks,<s%> and <S%H2009>behold,<s%> <S%H376>each<s%> man's <S%H3701>money<s%> was in the <S%H6310>mouth<s%> of his <S%H572>sack,<s%> our <S%H3701>money<s%> in <S%H4948>full.<s%> So we have <S%H7725>brought<s%> it <S%H7725>back<s%> in our <S%H3027>hand.<s%>

"We have also <S%H3381>brought<s%> <S%H3381>down<s%> <S%H312>other<s%> <S%H3701>money<s%> in our <S%H3027>hand<s%> to <S%H7666>buy<s%> <S%H400>food;<s%> we do not <S%H3045>know<s%> <S%H4310>who<s%> <S%H7760>put<s%> our <S%H3701>money<s%> in our <S%H572>sacks.<s%>"

And he <S%H559>said,<s%> "Be at <S%H7965>ease,<s%> do not be <S%H3372>afraid.<s%> Your <S%H430>God<s%> and the <S%H430>God<s%> of your father has <S%H1>given<s%> you <S%H5414>treasure<s%> in your <S%H4301>sacks;<s%> I <S%H572>had<s%> your <S%H935>money.<s%>" Then he <S%H3701>brought<s%> <S%H3318>Simeon<s%> out to them.

Then the <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H935>brought<s%> the <S%H376>men<s%> into Joseph's <S%H1004>house<s%> and <S%H5414>gave<s%> them <S%H4325>water,<s%> and they <S%H7364>washed<s%> their <S%H7272>feet;<s%> and he <S%H5414>gave<s%> their <S%H2543>donkeys<s%> <S%H4554>fodder.<s%>

So they <S%H3559>prepared<s%> the <S%H4503>present<s%> for Joseph's <S%H935>coming<s%> at <S%H6672>noon;<s%> for they had <S%H8085>heard<s%> that they were to <S%H398>eat<s%> a <S%H3899>meal<s%> <S%H8033>there.<s%>

When <S%H3130>Joseph<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> <S%H1004>home,<s%> they <S%H935>brought<s%> into the <S%H1004>house<s%> to him the <S%H4503>present<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> was in their <S%H3027>hand<s%> and <S%H7812>bowed<s%> to the <S%H776>ground<s%> before him.

Then he <S%H7592>asked<s%> them about their <S%H7965>welfare,<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%> "Is your <S%H2205>old<s%> father <S%H1>well,<s%> of <S%H7965>whom<s%> you <S%H834>spoke<s%>? Is he <S%H559>still<s%> <S%H5750>alive<s%>?"
And they <S%H559>said,<s%> "Your <S%H5650>servant<s%> our father is <S%H1>well;<s%> he is <S%H7965>still<s%> <S%H5750>alive.<s%>" And they <S%H2416>bowed<s%> <S%H6915>down<s%> in <S%H7812>homage.<s%>

As he <S%H5375>lifted<s%> his <S%H5869>eyes<s%> and <S%H7200>saw<s%> his <S%H251>brother<s%> <S%H1144>Benjamin,<s%> his mother's <S%H1121>son,<s%> he <S%H559>said,<s%> "Is <S%H2088>this<s%> your <S%H9512>youngest<s%> <S%H251>brother,<s%> of <S%H834>whom<s%> you <S%H559>spoke<s%> to me?" And he <S%H559>said,<s%> "May <S%H430>God<s%> be <S%H2603>gracious<s%> to you, my <S%H1121>son.<s%>"

And <S%H3130>Joseph<s%> <S%H4116>hurried<s%> [out] for he was <S%H7356>deeply<s%> <S%H3648>stirred<s%> <S%H413>over<s%> his <S%H251>brother,<s%> and he <S%H1245>sought<s%> [a place] to <S%H1058>weep;<s%> and he <S%H935>entered<s%> his <S%H2315>chamber<s%> and <S%H1058>wept<s%> <S%H8033>there.<s%>
Then he <S%H7364>washed<s%> his <S%H6440>face,<s%> and <S%H3318>came<s%> out; and he <S%H662>controlled<s%> himself and <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H7760>"Serve<s%> the <S%H3899>meal.<s%>"

So they <S%H7760>served<s%> him by <S%H905>himself,<s%> and them by <S%H905>themselves,<s%> and the <S%H4713>Egyptians,<s%> who <S%H398>ate<s%> with him, by <S%H905>themselves;<s%> <S%H3588>because<s%> the <S%H4713>Egyptians<s%> <S%H3201>could<s%> not <S%H398>eat<s%> <S%H3899>bread<s%> with the <S%H5680>Hebrews,<s%> for that is <S%H8441>loathsome<s%> to the <S%H4714>Egyptians.<s%>

Now they were <S%H3427>seated<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> him, the first-born according to his <S%H1062>birthright<s%> and the <S%H6810>youngest<s%> according to his <S%H6812>youth,<s%> and the <S%H376>men<s%> <S%H8539>looked<s%> at <S%H376>one<s%> <S%H7453>another<s%> in <S%H8539>astonishment.<s%>

And he <S%H5375>took<s%> <S%H4864>portions<s%> to them from his own <S%H6440>table;<s%> but Benjamin's <S%H4864>portion<s%> was <S%H2568>five<s%> <S%H3027>times<s%> as <S%H7235>much<s%> as <S%H3605>any<s%> of theirs. So they <S%H8354>feasted<s%> and <S%H7937>drank<s%> <S%H7937>freely<s%> with him.
